revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=TeraStation |revision=TS-RIXL/R5 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=03/2009 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.1 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=MV78100 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF084G2B-TPCB |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5182FFP-S5C |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1118 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1118 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3243;;1;,,, RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1;,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 4Bit SPI Serial Flash;STMicro;M25P40;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Pericom;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, 30V 7A Switching Transistor;Rohm Semi;SP8K3;;1;,,, 4-Port PCIe SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 8-bit Single-Chip Microcontroller;NEC; D78F0513;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type;TI;SN74LVC74A;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP1212;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;2;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC08A;;3;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;5;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-NAND Gate;TI;SN74LVC00A;;2;,,, 28V 3A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4525A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, metal case, Dual fan, heatsink |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=4C:E6:76 }} {{TagLine|TeraStation III iSCSI Rackmount}} :[https://www.buffalotech.com/products/terastation-iiii-scsi Support page] :[https://opensource.buffalo.jp/ts-xl-161.html Latest GPL Source] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' MV78100 @800MHz Dual Issue (ARM v5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, 4x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 3x USB 2.0 *Power: 120-240V via C13 ==Images== ---- File:Buffalo TS-RIXL-R5 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Buffalo TS-RIXL-R5 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Buffalo TS-RIXL-R5 Power Board.jpeg|Power Board File:Buffalo TS-RIXL-R5 SATA Board.jpeg|SATA Board File:Buffalo TS-RIXL-R5 Internal View.jpeg|Internal View [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
